body.t: SVOML is composed from XML Schema and XLS (xml stylesheet).
You can see raw SVOML file from "View Source" functions.
body.h:
Words groups are
nestable
and SVOC groups are available.
body.t: Also, SVOML supoorts drawing arrows from a group to a group.
For security issues, browsers disabled XLST if the XML file is on your local storage. So, you have to open SVOML files via HTTP.
body.h: You can use localhost, for example, python -m http.server
